H1.text: who plays billy elliot. Ansel Elgort

H3.text: who plays billy elliot. Jamie Bell

A4.text: In 1999, Bell was chosen from a field of over 2,000 boys for the role of Billy Elliot, an 11-year-old boy who dismays his working-class widowed father and elder brother by taking up ballet.

A5.text: He rose to prominence with his debut performance in Billy Elliot (2000), for which he won the BAFTA Award for Best Actor, becoming the youngest-ever winner in the category.
